moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Keep it Up!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

passives.name: Wide Awake
passives.description: Prevents the user from falling asleep.

passives.name: Troublemaker 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of success for status moves that inflict status conditions.

passives.name: Burn Synergy 2
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when the target is burned.
